< Hartmann von Aue
1:
--------------------
Text: Hartmann von Aue:  He introduced the courtly romance into German literature and, with Wolfram von Eschenbach ("c." 1170–"c." 1220) and Gottfried von Strassburg (died "c." 1210), was one of the three great epic poets of Middle High German literature.
